messages.subject: For Virginia unschoolers: VAEclecticHS Yahoo! group
messages.msgSnippet: Some time back, someone asked for information specific to Virginia unschoolers and Virginia-specific compliance issues.   I don t post much, but did at that
messages.messageBody:
Some time back, someone asked for information specific to Virginia
unschoolers and Virginia-specific compliance issues.   I don't
post much, but did at that time provide a link to the
VAEclecticHomeschool Yahoo! group.

As of the July 4 long weekend, that group is no longer available, due
to a Yahoo! glitch.

To remedy this, the VAEclecticHS List is the rebirth of
VAEclecticHomeschool, which was a large, active list for
in-depth discussion of issues affecting homeschooling, and for news
about media articles and programs, proposed legislation, research,
conferences and other information of interest to Virginia
homeschoolers.

If you were one of those 1200+ listmembers from Virginia and were
wondering where the old VAEclectic went, here's how to get back (or
join for the first time)--

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/VAEclecticHS/

VAEclecticHS-subscribe@yahoogroups.com


Gail Dawson
